sources.title: Patterns (TV-1955) ROD SERLINGüçï EVERETTE SLOAN
sources.description:
It's Friday@PizzaFLIX 
CAPTURED LIVE on KINOSCOPE!
Writer: Rod Serling
Starring: Everett Sloane, Ed Begley, Richard Kiley
üçïKRAFT THEATRE Season 8 Episode 16üçï
This blistering Television drama dissects the dark underbelly of corporate ambition. When an idealistic engineer joins a high-powered New York firm, he finds himself in the shadow of a ruthless executive bent on shaping him as his perfect successor. But soon realizes that his ascension comes at the moral cost of his ailing, more ethical colleague. 

Are you a PizzaFLIX Fanatic? Join our exclusive Fan Club for dedicated Classic movie lovers: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCE34fwgW7kWr7tc7YiOWtRw/join
